Title: Surrender or Else!
Description:
$n, you and Ace need to march those naga hatchlings down there and use them as leverage to convince the leader of the naga to surrender to us.

Ace knows where to go on the south side of the ruins... just follow him.
ObjectivesText: Deal with the leader of the Naga at the Ruins of Vashj'elan.
PortraitGiverText: This is their leader?! Deal with it!
RewardText:
A faceless of the deep? What's that? That does NOT sound like a naga!

Well, you killed it, whatever it was. It doesn't matter now. We have other fish to fry....

Objectives.Text: Leader of the naga dealt with
